TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MailWebEventProvider extends System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider
Public MustInherit Class MailWebEventProvider Inherits BufferedWebEventProvider

summary.span: 提供基本功能，用于创建发送电子邮件的事件提供程序。

span.span: Provides the base functionality for creating event providers that send email.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视，用于管理已部署的 Web 应用程序的生产和操作人员。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含负责打包应用程序运行状况状态数据和负责处理此数据提供程序类型的运行状况事件类型。The namespace contains the health event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含在管理运行状况事件期间帮助的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 类是用于构建用于监视 Web 事件和发送电子邮件所选事件提供程序的基类。The class is a base class for building providers that monitor Web events and send email for selected events. 此类支持.NET Framework 基础结构和未用于继承自或在代码中直接使用。This class supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be inherited from or used directly from your code. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下，你将是一种能够使用 ASP.NET 运行状况监视类型，因为实现，并且将通过指定中的值控制运行状况监视系统``配置节。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `` configuration section. 你还可以从要创建你自己的自定义事件和提供程序的运行状况监视类型派生。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 有关创建自定义提供程序的示例，请参阅[如何： 实现运行状况监视自定义提供程序示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bbb1c959-e6e4-42b2-be62-49b7ca5ab72c)。For an example of creating a custom provider, see [How to: Implement the Health Monitoring Custom Provider Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bbb1c959-e6e4-42b2-be62-49b7ca5ab72c).

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Initialize (string name, System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection config);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(string name, class System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection config) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Initialize (name As String, config As NameValueCollection)
public: override void Initialize(System::String ^ name, System::Collections::Specialized::NameValueCollection ^ config);

param.name: name
param.span: 配置文件中用于标识此提供程序的名称。

span.span: The name used in the configuration file to identify this provider.

param.name: config
param.span: 一个 ，指定配置文件中为此提供程序分配的特性。

span.span: A that specifies the attributes assigned for this provider in the configuration file.
Sets the initial values for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法以初始化的配置设置和配置文件中指定的名称。This method is called to initialize the with the configuration settings and name as specified in the configuration file.

exception.span: 在 中未分配任何收件人。

span.span: No recipients have been assigned in .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void ProcessEvent(class System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent eventRaised) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub ProcessEvent (eventRaised As WebBaseEvent)

summary.span: 处理传递给提供程序的事件。

span.span: Processes the event passed to the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是，ASP.NET 运行状况监视功能可调用以启动事件的处理方法。This is the method that ASP.NET health monitoring calls to start the processing of the event.

span.para: 如果启用了缓冲，你必须处理向缓冲区添加事件。
If buffering is enabled, you must handle adding events to the buffer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void ProcessEventFlush(class System.Web.Management.WebEventBufferFlushInfo flushInfo) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub ProcessEventFlush (flushInfo As WebEventBufferFlushInfo)

param.name: flushInfo
param.span: 包含等待发送其通知的事件计数的 。

span.span: The that contains the count of events waiting to send their notification.

summary.span: 从提供程序的缓冲区中移除所有事件。

span.span: Removes all events from the provider's buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 需要刷新事件缓冲区时，将由运行状况监视系统调用此方法。This method is called by the health-monitoring system when an event buffer flush is required. 刷新事件缓冲区时，会出现通知并将整个事件缓冲区发送到尽可能少的消息中的收件人，尽可能情况下，而不考虑的长度时从上次通知已用时间。When the event buffer is flushed, a notification occurs and the entire event buffer is sent to the recipients in as few messages as possible, regardless of the length of time elapsed since the last notification.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Shutdown() cil managed

summary.span: 执行与关闭提供程序相关联的任务。

span.span: Performs tasks associated with shutting down the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 调用方法时托管 Web 应用程序的应用程序域终止。ASP.NET calls the method when the application domain hosting the Web application terminates. 该方法调用以执行将允许应用程序正常结束的任务。The method is called to perform tasks that will allow the application to end gracefully.
